The House Entrepreneurship Caucus believes in empowering the pursuit of America‚Äôs innovators by removing the barriers that make it harder to start a business.

This ‚Äòspirit of the start-up‚Äô is built into our DNA. America is home to the world‚Äôs greatest inventions, companies, and technological advances because we believe that anyone with a good idea and determination can build a business that changes the world.

The U.S. has served as a global beacon of innovation delivering remarkable new products & services that improve the lives of all Americans. Today, over 99% of U.S. employers are small business owners creating 57 million jobs that generate 44% of all U.S. economic activity.
